recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook pasta al dente. 2. Crisp guanciale. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine with hot pasta.

recipes.name: Simple Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: 1. Cut chicken into pieces. 2. Stir-fry vegetables. 3. Add chicken and sauce. 4. Cook until done.

recipes.name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: 1. Cream butter and sugars. 2. Add eggs and vanilla. 3. Mix in dry ingredients. 4. Bake.
